#!/usr/bin/env ruby -wKU
abort if File.exists? ENV['TM_NEW_FILE'] is_on_tiger = %x{ defaults read /System/Library/CoreServices/SystemVersion ProductVersion } =~ /\A10\.4/
addr = "«your address»" if is_on_tiger require ENV['TM_SUPPORT_PATH'] + '/lib/osx/plist' me_entry = ENV['HOME'] + '/Library/Preferences/AddressBookMe.plist' if File.exists? me_entry a = File.open(me_entry) { |io| OSX::PropertyList.load(io) }
addr = a['StreetAddr1'] + "\n" addr += a['StreetAddr2'] + "\n" unless a['StreetAddr2'].to_s.empty? addr += a['ZipPostal'] + " " + a['City'] end else require 'osx/cocoa' OSX.require_framework "AddressBook" OSX.ns_import :ABAddressBook OSX.ns_import :ABPerson OSX.ns_import :ABMultiValue
me_entry = OSX::ABAddressBook.sharedAddressBook.me a = me_entry.valueForProperty(OSX::KABAddressProperty).valueAtIndex(0)
addr = a['Street'] + "\n" addr += a['ZIP'] + " " + a['City'] end
open(ENV['TM_NEW_FILE'], 'w') do |out| out << IO.read('letter.tex').gsub(/\$\{([^}]+)\}/) do if $1 == 'AUTHOR_ADDR' "\n\t" + addr.gsub(/\n/, " \\\\\\\\\n\t") + "\n" else ENV[$1] end end end
Letter (for C5 and E65 window envelopes)
